item.description:
This is a special 1 time only Private “Social Fun Only” Boston Halloween Party for 100 Social Fun members at Jose McIntyre's (near Faneuil Hall) at 160 Milk St Boston, MA 02109. Tel. (617) 451-9460

Website: www.irishconnection.com/jose.html

Jose McIntyre's 2nd floor holds 225 people, but it will be just our Social Fun Group. We’ll have our own DJ, dance floor, bathrooms,  bar area, couches, bartenders, etc. so this will truly be a private just us Halloween party.

Everyone must wear a costume that is why I am inviting just our group so we have plenty of room and I am not getting food because it will be messy with the costumes! ...Yes you can change into your costume there but please come early to do that!

I will be supplying and decorating Jose Mac’s with Halloween Decorations. There will be a the following cash prizes:

  • $50 cash prizes for the most interesting Female costume
  • $50 cash prizes for the most interesting male costume
  • $25 cash prizes for the second interesting Female costume
  • $25 cash prizes for the second most interesting male costume

You’ll really need to work the crowd as there will be secret judges to determine the top 5 interesting Female costumes and the top 5 most interesting male costumes

Then at 9PM we’ll have a thrilling Halloween costume showdown where these top 10 members in cool costumes will strut their stuff around the bar to see which gets the most cheers from the crowd that night!

Then the DJ and Biagio will determine the winners from the excitement of the crowd during the thrilling Halloween costume showdown. This will determine who wins each prize!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Note: Background music will be at low levels upstairs from 7 to 9PM so members will have some quite time to discus which costumes are the best. After Halloween costume showdown (which should be around 9:20PM) the dancing + loud music starts. Please do not complain, since members come to dance to music after 9:20PM.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

When you get there just head upstairs, (please do not block the stairway) there will be a private party sign up. Then meet/greet Biagio, your host for the night. Please say your first name,  what group you are with, and pay with a $10 bill in hand at the top of the stairs (no $1 or 5 bills, please). We will be stamping hands or part of your costume (if you let us) to mark who is already in so you can go upstairs and downstairs.

1. Everyone, but the invited leads, pays $10 cash.

2. After 9 p.m. you will have to pay another cover charge to the bar, so stretch your dollar and come before 9PM.  If you get in before 9PM you ONLY have to pay $10 to Biagio.

3. If you come after 8PM you might not get in right away, just to be clear and you might not be qualified for any prizes!

I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party. It should be fun so thanks and enjoy life!

Ciao, Biagio

========================================

Parking for this event: Street parking can be tough so you can try and of course it's hit or miss. Your best bet it take the T. The closet T stop is The Aquarium stop on the Blue line, Nest would be State Street stop on the Orange line.

If you really must drive in and park then use this link: http://boston.centralparking.com/Boston-60-State-Street-Parking-parking-coupon.html

to print out a web coupon for $10 parking after 5PM at 60 State Street Boston, MA 02109.

If link does not work use this link http://boston.centralparking.com/Boston-60-State-Street-Parking.html just make sure you click the click here to get to the coupon page and then print out the coupon with a bar code.
item.how_to_find_us: We have the whole 2nd floor of Jose McIntyre's to ourselves. Look for Biagio at the top of the stairs.
item.name: Private “Social Fun Only” Boston Halloween Party with $150 in cash prizes
